des:
By using Bluguard Smart Home, you can control any Bluguard Smart Home devices with simple voice control.

To control Bluguard Smart Home with Alexa, you need:
- Get a Bluguard Smart Home Gateway and its devices (switch or dimmer)
- Download Bluguard SmartHome App
- Login Bluguard Smart Home Gateway with Bluguard SmartHome App
- Go to Settings > Other Settings > Voice Control
- Login with your Gmail Account and enable Amazon Alexa Voice Control Service
- Download Amazon Alexa App from Amazon Market, Google Play or App Store, and connect Echo with Amazon Alexa App
- Search “Bluguard Smart Home” in Skills & Games directory with Amazon Alexa App
- Click “Enable To Use” button and then login your Google Account
- Discover devices in Amazon Alexa App
- Say:
“Alexa, turn on the switch”
“Alexa, turn off the switch”
“Alexa, turn on the light”
“Alexa, turn off the light”

For more Bluguard device information:
https://bluguard.com.my/products
